actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to require contractors of departments and agencies of the United States engaged in the production of motion picture films to pay prevailing wages.

summary.text: Requires contractors, and their subcontractors, of departments and agencies of the United States engaged in the production of motion picture films to pay prevailing wages to employees specified under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to require contractors of departments and agencies of the United States engaged in the production of motion picture films to pay prevailing wages.
